items.title: SQS queue utilities and integration

items.title: Video generation API endpoints
items.details: POST /generate, GET /status, GET /stream (SSE), quota checking, job enqueuing

items.title: Node.js worker service
items.details: SQS polling, video processor, database operations, mock provider, S3 upload

items.title: Video generation UI with progress tracking
items.details: SSE streaming, progress bar, status icons, video playback, download, settings
